title: Chicken Cordon Bleu Grilled Sandwich Recipe
directions: Mix all the honey mustard sauce ingredients together until well blended.
Spread desired amount of honey mustard sauce on one slice of bread.
Then add cooked chicken strips, 2 ham slices, and 2 slices of swiss cheese.
Top with the other slice of bread.
Butter the top of the sandwich and place buttered side down on a heated skillet or griddle.
While cooking, butter the slice of bread that is facing up.
Cook about 3 minutes on each side or until bread is golden brown and the cheese starts to melt.
*You could also use a shredded rotisserie chicken to make this recipe so easy!
ingredients: 12 ounces cooked chicken breast strips (I used Tyson Grilled and Ready Chicken)
